SELECT IDProcess as pid,(Name==null?'0':'1') as avail,Name as command
SELECT (PercentProcessorTime>50?(100-PercentProcessorTime):PercentProcessorTime) as PercentProcessorTime,IDProcess as pid,Name as command

SELECT IDProcess as pid,CommandLine,Name as command
